name: Soul Savior
description:
What is Soul Savior ?

Soul Savior is an arcade game in which the player embodies a soul reaper who must break as many amphorae as possible. The blue amphorae will bring you points, while the red ones will make you lose points. The goal of the game is therefore to break as many good amphora as possible before running out of time.

Soul Savior is the game that we created for our first year at school. We were 3 people and Soul Savior is the very first game we developed. Apart from the music, we have created everything ourselves, and we hope you will like the game ! 

Controls

ZQSD : Move 

Mouse : Aim 

Left click : Melee attack 

Right click : Scythe boomerang 

Development team 

Game Design & Programming : Tristan Loor 

Sound Design & Level Design : Sébastien Mory

Game art : Baptiste Denoeud 

All the music used comes from the Chipped of the Necrodancer playlist composed by Chipzel, as well as the music That's some Spooky Stuff by Meganeko.
